page.title: 08FARMING WINTERBOURNE VALLEY
page.content: {PIGS}Intensive fattening unit at Pen Barn has 6000 Large White X Landrace pigs in covered pens. Pigs are bought as 40kg weaners from Somerset farm owned by the same Family. Cheese is made here and Whey byproduct sent by bulk tanker to Pen Barn for feeding to the pigs with Balancer meal: a mixture of wheat/barley/rapeseed/maize/gluten/ minerals/vitamins & copper for growth. NO growth-promotion steroids are used. Daily feed: 7500 galls Whey + 7 tons meal. Weaners fattened to 100kg liveweight & bought as baconers by Taunton Abattoir. The type of breed and correct feeding are essential as carcasses are graded and payment depends on length and ratio of fat to lean. Average price is Â£75 per head. Effluent from unit sprayed over fields by tractor - drawn slurry tankers obviates need for chemical fertilisers
